articles.title: ‘130 mn 5G users in India by end-2023’ | Mint - Mint

articles.content: India will have 130 million 5G users by the end of this year, within just over a year of consumer 5G services being launched in the country. Indias 5G user base has more than tripled from last yearan… [+3562 chars]
